name: Lovebug (itch) (zeestar)
description:
Created for one button game jam, inspired by an old joke *, play as a moth seeking true love! Fart your way through a world of MORTAL THREATS to find your soulmate. Playable with keyboard, mouse or gamepad.

In this pre-release version there are actually no threats and no soulmate.

Credits:

  • Design, Programming, Audio: zeestar
  • Graphics: zeestar, a.key

* How do you know when a moth farts? It's the only time he flies in a straight line!
